aiTools.title: AI for Coding & Development Tools
aiTools.description: Explore the latest AI tools for more efficient AI-powered coding. Integrate your favorite AI coding agents for a next-level development workflow.

claudeCode.description: Agentic coding assistant that automatically pulls context into prompts. Features CLAUDE.md support, MCP integration, and works directly in your terminal.

opencode.description: Open source AI coding agent with 80K+ GitHub stars. LSP-enabled, supports 75+ LLM providers, privacy-first with no code storage.

droid.description: Enterprise-grade AI coding agents that work everywhere: IDE, web, CLI, Slack. Automates coding, testing, and deployment.

antigravity.description: Google's AI-powered IDE with agentic capabilities. Autonomous planning, direct system access, self-validation, powered by Gemini 3 Pro.

cursor.description: AI code editor with Agent mode, Tab autocomplete, and deep codebase understanding. Supports multiple AI models.

kiro.description: AWS's agentic IDE with spec-driven development. Features advanced steering, custom agents, MCP support, and autopilot mode.

reviews.title: Vibe Coding Community Member Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Real testimonials from Indonesian developers who have joined our community

0.text: VibeDev ID changed how I learn coding! From being stuck alone, now I have solid friends for discussion and project collaboration. Networking here is top-notch!
0.name: Rizki Pratama

1.text: A truly supportive community! I successfully launched my first fintech startup thanks to feedback and mentorship from senior developers at VibeDev ID. A real game changer!
1.name: Sari Indrawati

2.text: As a fresh graduate, VibeDev ID gave me exposure to real-world projects and quality code reviews. Now I'm confident working at a big tech company.
2.name: Amanda Putri

3.text: The project showcase at VibeDev ID became my best portfolio. Many recruiters approached me after seeing the works I shared on this platform.
3.name: Budi Santoso

4.text: From hobby project to profitable business! Collaborating with VibeDev ID members helped me find the right co-founder and now our startup has secured seed funding.
4.name: Dimas Ardiansyah

5.text: Workshops and tech talks at VibeDev ID are always up to date with the latest tech. I can keep up with React, Next.js, and AI development trends thanks to this community.
5.name: Maya Sari

faq.title: Vibe Coding Indonesia Community FAQ
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about joining the largest Indonesian vibe coder community

0.question: What is VibeDev ID?
0.answer: VibeDev ID is the #1 Indonesian vibe coding community for developers, AI enthusiasts, and tech innovators who share a vision to create cool digital products. We connect like-minded Indonesian vibe coders to collaborate, learn coding with AI, and grow together.

1.question: How do I join this vibe coding community?
1.answer: Joining the Indonesian vibe coding community is super easy! Click the 'Join Community' button and complete your profile. We welcome developers of all levels - from beginners just learning to code with AI to experienced professionals.

2.question: Is there a cost to join the Indonesian vibe coding community?
2.answer: Basic membership in our vibe coding community is 100% free! You get access to community forums, project showcases, networking opportunities, and learning to code with AI alongside other members. All core features are free for all Indonesian vibe coders.

3.question: Can I collaborate on projects with other members?
3.answer: Collaboration is the core of our vibe coding community! You can find teammates to code with AI, join existing open source projects, or start your own project. Many Indonesian vibe coders here have successfully built startups together.

4.question: What technology and AI tools are supported?
4.answer: Our Indonesian vibe coding community embraces all modern technologies! Active members work with React, Next.js, Python, AI/ML frameworks, and AI coding tools like GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, and Claude. If it's cutting-edge tech, you'll surely find expert vibe coders here.

cta.description: Join now and enjoy the best vibe coding experience with other Indonesian developers. Free, supportive, and full of collaboration!

footer.copyright: ¬© 2025 VibeDev ID - The largest Indonesian vibe coding community for future developers.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms

acceptance.important: Important: If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Service.

byUs.description: We may terminate accounts for Terms violations, prohibited conduct, security risks, or extended inactivity.
